name: playwright-demo
description: Playwright E2E testing demo with React, Angular, and Vue.js

scripts.test:react: cd playwright-tests && npx playwright test react/
scripts.test:react:basic: cd playwright-tests && npx playwright test react/react-app.spec.ts
scripts.test:react:crud: cd playwright-tests && npx playwright test react/react-crud.spec.ts
scripts.test:angular: cd playwright-tests && npx playwright test angular/
scripts.test:angular:basic: cd playwright-tests && npx playwright test angular/angular-app.spec.ts
scripts.test:angular:crud: cd playwright-tests && npx playwright test angular/angular-crud.spec.ts
scripts.test:vue: cd playwright-tests && npx playwright test vue/
scripts.test:vue:basic: cd playwright-tests && npx playwright test vue/vue-app.spec.ts
scripts.test:vue:crud: cd playwright-tests && npx playwright test vue/vue-crud.spec.ts
scripts.codegen:react: cd playwright-tests && npx playwright codegen http://localhost:5173
scripts.codegen:angular: cd playwright-tests && npx playwright codegen http://localhost:4200
scripts.codegen:vue: cd playwright-tests && npx playwright codegen http://localhost:5174
